entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
